attributes.action: get Britain involved with the situation in Zimbabwe to stop the murder of inoccent people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need to speak out and help out....
Do you not think that it is a disgrace what is happening in Zimbabwe.  Why has Britain not stepped in yet and begun to help the innocent people under the bullying tactics of Mugabe.  This man needs to be stopped, how many people are to be killed just because he wants to rule in an unfair, evil manner.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
